title: Anyone to play Normals? (Grind to 30)

replies.body: I can help. I'm 30 already but I usually play normals cause of the toxic in ranked and I'd say I have a very high win rate on normals, and can carry hard for you, have a good attitude and can give some laughs :D so add me if you want.
Im keen maybe, I play normals sometimes.
its called having friends like a normal functioning person in society would
Shots fired. I have a group of friends I play with every day, but I made this thread to look for more people as they're not as serious as I am and so I have a wider group of people to play with.
